pages.text: Affects fury spells only. Doubles Fury XP gained on spell-cast, and increases fury spell levels by 1. Affects:$(li)Path of Lethality$(li)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter absorbs your inner fury and channels it through its spells. Imbued with the Furious Scepter and persists on that scepters paths.
